Reference

All functions

ASE_limma() ASE_limma_timeseries() ASE_DESeq() ASE_DoubleExpSeq() ASE_satuRn()

Differential Alternative Splicing Event analysis

ASEFilter()

SpliceWiz filters to remove low-confidence alternative splicing and intron retention events

getResources() buildRef() buildFullRef() getNonPolyARef()

Builds reference files used by SpliceWiz

getCoverage() getCoverage_DF() getCoverageRegions() getCoverageBins()

Calls SpliceWiz's C++ function to retrieve coverage from a COV file

spliceWiz()

Launches the SpliceWiz Graphics User Interface (GUI) using Shiny Dashboard

generateSyntheticReads() calculateMappability()

Calculate low mappability genomic regions

NxtSE() up_inc(<NxtSE>) down_inc(<NxtSE>) up_exc(<NxtSE>) down_exc(<NxtSE>) covfile(<NxtSE>) sampleQC(<NxtSE>) ref(<NxtSE>) junc_PSI(<NxtSE>) junc_counts(<NxtSE>) junc_gr(<NxtSE>) realize_NxtSE(<NxtSE>) `up_inc<-`(<NxtSE>) `down_inc<-`(<NxtSE>) `up_exc<-`(<NxtSE>) `down_exc<-`(<NxtSE>) `covfile<-`(<NxtSE>) `sampleQC<-`(<NxtSE>) `[`(<NxtSE>,<ANY>,<ANY>,<ANY>) `[<-`(<NxtSE>,<ANY>,<ANY>,<NxtSE>) cbind(<NxtSE>) rbind(<NxtSE>)

The NxtSE class

getDefaultFilters() applyFilters() runFilter()

Filtering for IR and Alternative Splicing Events

STAR_version() STAR_buildRef() STAR_mappability() STAR_alignExperiment() STAR_alignReads()

STAR wrappers for building reference for STAR, and aligning RNA-sequencing

SpliceWiz-package

SpliceWiz: efficient and precise alternative splicing analysis in R

viewASE() viewIR() viewIntrons() viewIR_NMD() viewExons() viewGenes() viewProteins() viewTranscripts()

View SpliceWiz Reference in read-able data frames

collateData()

Collates a dataset from (processBAM) output files of individual samples

coord2GR()

Converts genomic coordinates into a GRanges object

SpliceWiz_example_bams() SpliceWiz_example_NxtSE()

SpliceWiz Example BAMs and NxtSE Experiment Object

findSamples() findFASTQ() findBAMS() findSpliceWizOutput()

Convenience Function to (recursively) find all files in a folder.

isCOV()

Validates the given file as a valid COV file

makeSE()

Imports a collated dataset into the R session as an NxtSE object

makeMatrix() makeMeanPSI()

Construct data of percent-spliced-in (PSI) matrices and group-average PSIs

plotCoverage() plotGenome() as_ggplot_cov()

RNA-seq Coverage Plots and Genome Tracks

BAM2COV() processBAM()

Runs the OpenMP/C++ based SpliceWiz algorithm

setSWthreads()

Sets the number of threads used by SpliceWiz

theme_white theme_white_legend theme_white_legend_plot_track

ggplot2 themes
